UPDATE standard_unit_card_base_su
card_base_id = #{cardBaseId},
standard_unit_id = #{standardUnitId},
sort_value = #{sortValue},
`source` = #{source},
`snapshot` = #{snapshot},
`third_sku_Id` = #{thirdSkuId},
`sell_state` = #{sellState},
`check_time` = #{checkTime},
`sort_price` = #{sortPrice},
`sort_sales_num` = #{sortSalesNum},

update_time = #{updateTime},
